track.name: Hey Mama
comments: life hack: instead of stabbing yourself in the heart with a fork repeatedly for some 5 minutes, simply listen to this song to achieve the same effect
the performance of this at the grammies is literally the most heartbreaking thing ever
Gets me time after time.
Beautiful song but very painful for me to listen to...mixed feelings. =[
Songs like this prove that hip-hop is much more than showing off money and women. This is so beautiful.
Makes me cry every fucking time.
i cry my ass off
If I had the ability to cry, I would be right now. [2]
"Maya Angelou, Nicky Giovanni, turn one page and there's my mommy" :')
My mama told me go to school, get your doctorate. Something to fall back on you can profit with, but still supported me when I did the opposite... <3 [2]
If I had the ability to cry, I would be right now.
I got respect for Kanye because of such songs as this.
beautiful
wow, the freshmen adjustment version is so good.
splendid.
My mama told me go to school, get your doctorate. Something to fall back on you can profit with, but still supported me when I did the opposite... <3
Just tell me what kinda S-Type Donda West like!
made me tear :'( [6] R.I.P. Donda West [7]

I never really paid attention to this song until he played it at Coachella as the closer. I was having a good ol time with the concert, and then he finishes it with this. Unbelievable. It was just a VERY heartfelt moment just knowing as a fan that performing there was a big landmark for him. Afterwards, anytime I heard it I would REALLY listen to the lyrics, and now I can't listen without tearing up a bit.
Mommy, Imma love you till you don't hurt no more <3
